attributes.action: Remove from office, all those at Haringey Council involved in the 'Baby P' case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All Senior Managers, Social Work and Child Protection Officers at Haringey Council to be fired from their jobs for gross incompetence and criminal charges brought against those whose job it was to prevent such a case occuring

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
